title: Multi-Tenant Foundation & Authentication
description: Establish the core Laravel application with multi-tenancy architecture, user management, and role-based authentication system. Includes database schema setup, organization/user models, authentication middleware, and basic admin interface using Filament.

title: Helper & Traits
Game State Management and Event System
description: Implement the core game engine including game phases (setup, pre-game, active, endgame), event detection and processing, rule enforcement, and state transitions. Includes automatic event triggers, manual event creation, and the event timeline interface.

title: Interactive Map Interface with Zone Management
description: Build the primary map interface using Mapbox GL JS with real-time position display, zone creation/editing tools, and layer management. Includes different zone types (play areas, restricted zones, safe zones, exit points) with visibility rules and dynamic updates.
